name: places/ChIJV8znzwf2wokRAOecx4RrM7s
formattedAddress: 241 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 241 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
I have been calling for two months, to get info about this school. Every time I call the date for opening keeps getting pushed back. Today I called, the owner of the school suggested that I find another location because they are having a hard time getting started. It confused me, as to why he would suggest that, as a owner if a business.
Which leads me to believe, this would be a place with problems. He can't get started, suggesting I go some place else. As a business owner the last thing you would want is to send someone, who wants to come to your business away to another business. Just be aware, of this guy! Something isn't right. He then said they "might" be open at the end of July.  I won't be there. I'm taking goo suggestion and find some place else for my daughter to attend

originalText.text: Sorry to say this company is a fake . They duplicated EVERYTHING from my website and even used my company name , just beware !
